SEARCH
Package Observer

Interface GameModelObserver

All Known Subinterfaces:
RemoteClientInterface
All Known Implementing Classes:
Client, RemoteClientImplementation
public interface GameModelObserver
This Interface represents the adaptation of the standard Observer Interface to the methods and objects in use inside the Classes that needs to be updated following changes in the GameModel Class

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    onUpdateModelChairOwner(TurnView turnView, Player player)
    This method allows the GameModel to notify the RemoteClients that the chairOwner for this game has been set
    void
    onUpdateModelChat(TurnView turnView, String nickname, String chat, String receiver)
    This method allows the GameModel to notify the RemoteClients that a Player has written a message in the game chat
    void
    OnUpdateModelCommonGoal(TurnView turnView, CommonGoalType commonGoalType1, CommonGoalType commonGoalType2)
    This method allows the GameModel to notify the RemoteClients that the CommonGoals of this match have been set and which their CommonGoalTypes are
    void
    onUpdateModelCurrentPlayer(TurnView turnView, Player currPlayer)
    This method allows the GameModel to notify the RemoteClients that a new currPlayer has been set
    void
    onUpdateModelEndGame(TurnView turnView, Player currPlayer, boolean endGame)
    This method allows the GameModel to notify the RemoteClients that the game has ended
    void
    onUpdateModelGameHasEnd(TurnView turnView)
    This method allows the GameModel to notify the RemoteClients that the match has ended
    void
    onUpdateModelGameHasStarted(TurnView turnView)
    This method allows the GameModel to notify the RemoteClients that the game has started

    This method allows the GameModel to notify the RemoteClients that a new Player has been added to the match
    void
    onUpdateModelMatchWinner(TurnView turnView, String player)
    This method allows the GameModel to notify the RemoteClients that a Player has won the match

    onUpdateModelPlayersNumber(TurnView turnView, int playersNumber)
    This method allows the GameModel to notify the RemoteClients that a Player has set the total number of Players in the match

  • Method Details

    • onUpdateModelListPlayers

      void onUpdateModelListPlayers(TurnView turnView, Player player) throws RemoteException
      This method allows the GameModel to notify the RemoteClients that a new Player has been added to the match
      Parameters:
      turnView - the updated version of TurnView which is later sent to the RemoteClients
      player - the Player added to the match
      Throws:
      RemoteException - exception that underlines problems with the RMI Connection

    • onUpdateModelEndGame

      void onUpdateModelEndGame(TurnView turnView, Player currPlayer, boolean endGame) throws RemoteException
      This method allows the GameModel to notify the RemoteClients that the game has ended
      Parameters:
      turnView - the updated version of TurnView which is later sent to the RemoteClients
      currPlayer - the Player which is the currPlayer in the match
      endGame - a Boolean signaling whether the game has ended or not
      Throws:
      RemoteException - exception that underlines problems with the RMI Connection

    • onUpdateModelPlayersNumber

      void onUpdateModelPlayersNumber(TurnView turnView, int playersNumber) throws RemoteException
      This method allows the GameModel to notify the RemoteClients that a Player has set the total number of Players in the match
      Parameters:
      turnView - the updated version of TurnView which is later sent to the RemoteClients
      playersNumber - the number of Players set for this match
      Throws:
      RemoteException - exception that underlines problems with the RMI Connection

    • onUpdateModelChairOwner

      void onUpdateModelChairOwner(TurnView turnView, Player player) throws RemoteException
      This method allows the GameModel to notify the RemoteClients that the chairOwner for this game has been set
      Parameters:
      turnView - the updated version of TurnView which is later sent to the RemoteClients
      player - the Player who has been made chairOwner for this match
      Throws:
      RemoteException - exception that underlines problems with the RMI Connection

    • onUpdateModelGameHasStarted

      void onUpdateModelGameHasStarted(TurnView turnView) throws RemoteException
      This method allows the GameModel to notify the RemoteClients that the game has started
      Parameters:
      turnView - the updated version of TurnView which is later sent to the RemoteClients
      Throws:
      RemoteException - exception that underlines problems with the RMI Connection

    • onUpdateModelCurrentPlayer

      void onUpdateModelCurrentPlayer(TurnView turnView, Player currPlayer) throws RemoteException
      This method allows the GameModel to notify the RemoteClients that a new currPlayer has been set
      Parameters:
      turnView - the updated version of TurnView which is later sent to the RemoteClients
      currPlayer - the Player who has become currPlayer
      Throws:
      RemoteException - exception that underlines problems with the RMI Connection

    • onUpdateModelMatchWinner

      void onUpdateModelMatchWinner(TurnView turnView, String player) throws RemoteException
      This method allows the GameModel to notify the RemoteClients that a Player has won the match
      Parameters:
      turnView - the updated version of TurnView which is later sent to the RemoteClients
      player - the nickname of the Player that has won the match
      Throws:
      RemoteException - exception that underlines problems with the RMI Connection

    • onUpdateModelGameHasEnd

      void onUpdateModelGameHasEnd(TurnView turnView) throws RemoteException
      This method allows the GameModel to notify the RemoteClients that the match has ended
      Parameters:
      turnView - the updated version of TurnView which is later sent to the RemoteClients
      Throws:
      RemoteException - exception that underlines problems with the RMI Connection

    • onUpdateModelChat

      void onUpdateModelChat(TurnView turnView, String nickname, String chat, String receiver) throws RemoteException
      This method allows the GameModel to notify the RemoteClients that a Player has written a message in the game chat
      Parameters:
      turnView - the updated version of TurnView which is later sent to the RemoteClients
      nickname - the nickname of the Player that has sent the message
      chat - a String that contains the actual message sent in the chat
      Throws:
      RemoteException - exception that underlines problems with the RMI Connection

    • OnUpdateModelCommonGoal

      void OnUpdateModelCommonGoal(TurnView turnView, CommonGoalType commonGoalType1, CommonGoalType commonGoalType2) throws RemoteException
      This method allows the GameModel to notify the RemoteClients that the CommonGoals of this match have been set and which their CommonGoalTypes are
      Parameters:
      turnView - the updated version of TurnView which is later sent to the RemoteClients
      commonGoalType1 - the CommonGoalType set for CommonGoal1
      commonGoalType2 - the CommonGoalType set for CommonGoal2
      Throws:
      RemoteException - exception that underlines problems with the RMI Connection
